title: Advice for Saquon, Outlook for the Steelers, and Week 2 Likes | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright discuss the Patriots-Seahawks thriller and the play of Cam Newton (2:29). They discuss all the injuries that occurred in Week 2 and Ryan gives some advice to Saquon Barkley, who suffered an ACL injury (21:10). Then they give their Week 2 Likes (50:05) and talk about their Mic Checks for the week (01:08:00).

Hosts: Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
